seo.title: VascuPen (Vascular Pen) in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Pinpoint treatment for tiny facial vessels and broken capillaries. A precise companion to IPL for redness.

overview.p1: VascuPen delivers pinpoint energy to coagulate tiny facial vessels that IPL may miss.
overview.p2: We spot-treat with care for clearer, more even skin—often as a complement to IPL sessions.
